title: Takane No Ran-San
alternative_title: Ran the Peerless Beauty ; 高嶺の蘭さん ; 높은 산의 란 씨 ; 高岭之兰 ; สาวดอกฟ้ากับหนุ่มร้านดอกไม้ ; Цветок с вершины ; Jardin Secret ; Ran The Beautiful Flower ; Ran, a Beldade Incomparável
status: Ran the Peerless Beauty ; 高嶺の蘭さん ; 높은 산의 란 씨 ; 高岭之兰 ; สาวดอกฟ้ากับหนุ่มร้านดอกไม้ ; Цветок с вершины ; Jardin Secret ; Ran The Beautiful Flower ; Ran, a Beldade Incomparável
description:
Description :
        Ran is beautiful and stylish, with leading scores in her class. No boy on Earth would have the gall to try their hand with her, and no one would think that she’s so entirely innocent… except Akira. Join us in this innocent love story about Rin the “mountaintop flower” and Akira, whose parents own a flowershop.
---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Ran The Beautiful Flower** (2019)
